responses.rationale: Factual report of potential transmission without explicit framing cues. No intensifiers or loaded language.
Factual definition using technical terms ('Highly pathogenic') which are neutral per TECH_TERM_GUARD. No explicit framing.
Factual report of an event using neutral language. 'highly pathogenic' is a technical term here. No explicit framing.
Factual statement about relative risk for a specific group ('higher risk') without explicit alarmist framing.
Factual report of a past event (case detection) with specific details. No explicit framing cues.
Contains explicit low-risk framing ('considered to be low') which triggers a higher-priority rule (Q4 Reassuring).
